thread.title: Ground News - What you need to know about Toronto's New Year's Eve celebrations
thread.title_full: Ground News - What you need to know about Toronto's New Year's Eve celebrations

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - What you need to know about Toronto's New Year's Eve celebrations
text:
Summary by Ground News The City of Toronto will once again bring its New Year festivities to the waterfront. The fun will get underway at 10 p.m. with music by DJs Sofia Fly and Cozmic Cat. A 10-minute, high-altitude fireworks display synchronized to music will start at the stroke of midnight. Share menu More

CTV News Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Bell Media What you need to know about Toronto's New Year's Eve celebrations New Year’s Eve is just around the corner and Toronto is gearing up to ring in 2024 in style.
